title: Biden Has Begun the Interview Process for Supreme Court Pick
sub_head: President remains on track to announce his nominee by end of month, White House officials say
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden began the interview process for his Supreme Court nomination in recent days, according to a person familiar with the process.
Mr. Biden has said he intends to nominate for the first time a Black woman to the Supreme Court. She would succeed retiring Justice Stephen Breyer.
